item.title: Chad condemns Sudan's airport threat as 'declaration of war'
item.description: A Sudanese general said Chad's airports were legitimate targets because they were used to supply weapons.

item.title: Greenland condemns planned visits by Usha Vance and Trump adviser
item.description: The pair will make separate trips this week, after threats from the US president to take over the island.

item.title: US deportations to Venezuela resume after dispute
item.description: Nearly 200 people were on board the flight carrying Venezuelan migrants repatriated from the US.

item.title: Tate brothers report to Romanian police after return from US
item.description: The brothers report to police as part of an ongoing criminal investigation after returning from the US.

item.title: Tiger Woods confirms relationship with Trump's ex daughter-in-law
item.description: The veteran golfer announces he is dating Vanessa Trump, who used to be married to Donald Trump Jr.
